Episodes.Title: Magic Man
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Marion Dayre
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Lalo searches for the mysterious Michael. Now doing business as Saul Goodman, Jimmy unveils an unorthodox strategy that tests Kim's tolerance.

Episodes.Title: 50% Off
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Alison Tatlock
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy's promotional stunt has unintended consequences. Nacho takes extreme measures to earn Lalo's trust. Saul is a success at the courthouse but still has yet to win Kim over. Simmering with rage and self-loathing, Mike loses his...

Episodes.Title: The Guy for This
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Ann Cherkis
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy's business enters uncharted territory. Kim's confidence is tested when she's faced with a legal problem only she can solve. Nacho navigates increased pressure from Gus. Mike continues to spiral.

Episodes.Title: Namaste
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Gordon Smith
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: As Jimmy doubles down on "Saul Goodman", a deeply conflicted Kim brings him an interesting proposition. Gus makes a sacrifice in order to play the long game. Mike attempts to smooth things over with his family.

Episodes.Title: Dedicado a Max
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Marion Dayre
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: As she and Jimmy grow closer over their campaign to help a client, Kim makes a surprising call; Mike is restless during his out-of-town recuperation.

Episodes.Title: Wexler v. Goodman
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Thomas Schnauz
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Kim has a change of heart, but Saul is determined to stick it to Mesa Verde; Mike turns the heat up on Lalo; Nacho attempts to enlist support from above.

Episodes.Title: JMM
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Alison Tatlock
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy and Kim build a legal firewall with help from Huell; Kim sets things straight with her clients as Jimmy is compromised by his; Gus calms troubled waters in service of his plot to build an empire; Mike does damage control.

Episodes.Title: Bagman
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Gordon Smith
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: When a simple errand for a client goes sideways, Jimmy is pushed to the limit; Mike takes measures to contain the wrath of the cartel; Lalo gets an unexpected visitor.

Episodes.Title: Bad Choice Road
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Thomas Schnauz
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: In the wake of Jimmy's traumatic misadventure, Kim takes stock of what is important; Jimmy attempts to return to business as usual, but it's more difficult than anticipated; Gus and Mike set a plan in motion.

Episodes.Title: Something Unforgivable
Episodes.Writer: Vince Gilligan, Peter Gould, Ariel Levine
Episodes.Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy and Kim make a sideways move that takes a serious turn; Nacho gets closer to the cartel than he'd like.
